title.rendered: 2023 Women’s World Cup Follow Your Team Travel Packages

content.rendered:
Personalized Travel Packages to Follow Your Team at the 2023 Women’s World Cup

There is no greater thrill in sports than being part of the electric atmosphere as your team competes on the world’s biggest stage. Our 2023 Women’s World Cup Follow Your Team packages allow you to do just that. We’ll take care of all the details including first-class accommodations, transportation between your team’s host cities, match transfers and more, so you can relax and focus on cheering for your favorite country.

Our experienced team will design a personalized and private itinerary for you to follow your favorite team, including big names like gold-medal-winning Canada and Team USA. To make your 2023 Women’s World Cup experience absolutely perfect, you can customize it further with additional match-day experiences, unique excursions, private tours, and more. Whichever team has your heart, we’ll craft the ideal itinerary for you to experience their World Cup journey.

Complete 2023 Women’s World Cup Follow Your Team packages are available from $4,295 per person for 7-night packages and from $7,125 per person for 12-night packages, based on double occupancy.
